SEEALSO: SpreadsheetAddColumn, SpreadsheetDeleteColumns, SpreadsheetDeleteRow, SpreadsheetDeleteRows, SpreadsheetFormatColumn, SpreadsheetFormatColumns, SpreadsheetShiftColumns
DESCRIPTION: Deletes the data from a column of an Excel spreadsheet object. It does not delete the column.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object from which to delete the columns.
